explanation: [0-0] On a sunny beach, a blonde woman in a black dress is standing on the sand holding a drink. A man in a white vest and blue shorts is sitting on a beach chair looking at his phone. There is a blue striped beach towel on the ground, and a white building with a terrace in the background.

[0-6] Then the blonde woman walks towards the man in white, steps on the blue beach towel, and falls, the drink in her hand flying out. Then the screen switches to the man in white, who smiles at the camera and gives a thumbs-up, then starts digging a hole in the sand.
